The IVMRSurface interface is implemented on the media samples used by the Video Mixing Renderer Filter 7 (VMR-7). Filters can use this interface to access the underlying DirectDraw surface on which the media sample is based. Filters must always lock and unlock the surface using the methods available on this interface. Filters must never call lock or unlock directly on the DirectDraw surface interface returned from the method. Applications do not use this interface.
